Hi all,

Happy New Year. Does anyone out there know Alan Rushing? He joined the 
NTHK in SF during the summer, but did not put down the state and zip 
code in his address. He gave the city as Fairfield, which I would think 
is the place north of SF. Please have him contact me off list if 
someone can get in touch with him.

Gordon
